items.name: var textureType: MTLTextureType
items.desc: The texture type of the texture.

items.name: var textureDataType: MTLDataType
items.desc: The data type of the texture.

items.name: var access: MTLArgumentAccess
items.desc: The texture's read/write access to the argument.

items.name: var isDepthTexture: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the texture is a depth texture.
